text: Ærest of myle forda ondlong erge<../images/tbar.gif>in wæsceford.
Of wæsceforda ondlong erge ymb holaneige ufeweardre.
Of holaneige ufeweardre on þa acecge ufeweardre<../images/tbar.gif>&lang þære acecge ufewearde<../images/tbar.gif>on snæd weg foreweardre.
Of snæd wege ymb heanlege on æcnabrycge up ondlong broces<../images/tbar.gif>in ða dic.
Of aðelwoldes hege in hean oldan.
Of mærþorne ondlong geardes in ðæt hlid get.
Of ðam hlidgete ondlong stræte on dicesgeat of dicesgeate in ðæt ðridde geat.
And Eadgar cyning gean Healhstane his þegn hagan on hereforda on boc a on ece yrfe.
